verbose_text: The regulating effect of ROCK1 on TLR4 mediated NF-kappaB and ERK in HCECs were further supported by pre-administration of Y-27832, which decreased the expression and activity of all the pro inflammation and pro apoptosis molecules (XREF_FIG, XREF_FIG, XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) while increased the expression of Bcl-2 (XREF_FIG, XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
